answerText: Lotka-Volterra Equations [10] Sometimes it is easy to solve differential equations by changing coordinate systems. In such instances, one must find the determinant of this matrix, which contains partial derivatives of old coordinates with respect to new coordinates, in order to find the change in volume element.

subject: Science
question: Question: For ten points each, answer these questions about differential equations.   [10] In general, it is impossible to find an analytic solution to this set of coupled equations. This set of differential equations is used to model predator-prey relationships in biological systems.
